revision.comment: Added screen category to the article.
revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
'''[[Structs:Screen|Screen]]'''
native static int '''GetHeight'''()
== Usage == Gets the height of the screen. Note that this does not correspond to the view port. [[GetViewWindow]] should be used if getting the height of the view port is desired. This will take forced aspect ratios into account (e.g. it will return the height of the display area and not the height of the game window).
=== Return value === Returns the real pixel height of the screen.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:Screen]]
